Uses of Class
structure.Issue

  • Packages that use Issue 
    Package Description
    model  
    structure  
    view  

    • Uses of Issue in model

      Methods in model that return Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Issue Model.addComment(org.json.JSONObject comment, java.lang.String issueName, java.lang.String repoName)
      Adds the given comment to the given issue.
      Issue Model.addIssue(org.json.JSONObject jsonIssue, java.lang.String repoName)
      Adds the given issue(in JSON string format) to the given repository.
      Issue Model.editIssue(org.json.JSONObject changes, java.lang.String issueName, java.lang.String repoName)
      Edits the given issue with the given changes.
      Issue Model.getIssue(java.lang.String issueName, java.lang.String repoName)
      Gets the specified issue from the given repository.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Model.updateIssue(Issue issue)
      Completes the update of the given issue.

    • Uses of Issue in structure

      Methods in structure that return Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Issue Repository.getIssue(int index)
      Gets the index-th issue in this repository.
      Issue Repository.getIssue(java.lang.String issueName)
      Gets the issue with the given name in this repository.
      static Issue Issue.makeInstance(org.json.JSONObject obj, Repository repo)
      Creates an Issue instance from the given JSON object.
      Methods in structure with parameters of type Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Repository.addIssue(Issue issue)
      Adds the given issue to this repository's issue list.
      void Repository.replaceIssue(java.lang.String issueName, Issue editedIssue)
      Replaces the given issue with the given updated issue.
      Method parameters in structure with type arguments of type Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Repository.setIssues(java.util.ArrayList<Issue> list)
      Sets the issues for this repository.
      Constructors in structure with parameters of type Issue 
      Constructor and Description
      Issue(Issue issue)
      Creates a copy of the given issue.

    • Uses of Issue in view

      Methods in view with parameters of type Issue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void View.updateView(Issue issue)
      Prints the contents of the given issue to the console, formatted in its toString() method.
